meanings: however[no matter how] rich a man may be
however[no matter how] hard one may work

meanings.meaning: with the best will in the world

vlive.korean: 야 그래도 어? 아무리 그래도 어? Even so! How could you? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 요즘 너만 보면 자꾸 커진단 말이야 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP3
'아무리 생각해도 난 너를' - '난 너를~' "All I think about is you". - "Is you"~ 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 남사친이 진심으로 날 좋아한다고 고백했다 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP4
vlive.english: "All I think about is you". - "Is you"~

vlive.korean: '아무리 생각해도 난 너를' - '난 너를~' "All I think about is you". - "Is you"~ 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 남사친이 진심으로 날 좋아한다고 고백했다 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP4
vlive.english: "All I think about is you". - "Is you"~

vlive.korean: 그래서 오면서 내내 생각했는데 아무리 생각해도... On the way back, we thought about what to do but... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 혀니비니🐖🐇🦡
vlive.english: On the way back, we thought about what to do but...

vlive.korean: 저는 못 찾아요 - 그래? - 아무리 찾아도 - 그래? Fans can't find it. - Really? - No matter how hard they try. - Really? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : First UNLOCK tour of the year in NEW YORK!❤😁
vlive.english: Fans can't find it. - Really? - No matter how hard they try. - Really?

examples.korean: The animal refused to be enticed from its hole. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 동물은 아무리 유인해도 자기 굴에서 나오려 하지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The animal refused to be enticed from its hole. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The seriousness of the crime cannot be overstated. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 범죄의 심각성은 아무리 과장해도 지나치지 않다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The seriousness of the crime cannot be overstated. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The importance of preparation cannot be overemphasized. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 준비의 중요성은 아무리 강조해도 지나치지 않다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The importance of preparation cannot be overemphasized. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was a meal to tempt even the most jaded palate. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 아무리 음식에 물린 입이라도 입맛이 당기는 식사였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was a meal to tempt even the most jaded palate. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This should be clear even to the meanest intelligence. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 머리가 아무리 별 볼일 없는 사람에게도 이 점은 분명할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This should be clear even to the meanest intelligence. Add to Wordbook
